intro.intro: I'm a digital architect with a flair for crafting dynamic, end-to-end web experiences. As a Full Stack Developer, I weave together the art of design and the science of engineering to build intuitive and powerful applications. From pixel-perfect front-end interfaces to robust back-end systems, my toolkit includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Python. Every line of code I write is a step towards turning complex ideas into elegant, functional realities. Dive into my portfolio to discover the synergy of creativity and technology in my work.

cards.chess_card: Design and development of a web application with MongoDB database for tournament and player queries. Main chess club of the city.
cards.java_card: Application for client and order management, with role assignment system using JPA with Hibernate, and MySQL relational database.
